thread.title: constant haptic

comments.text: anyone else occasionally get constant haptic vibrations in 1 controller when picking up an object? when i go to steam menu it stops. but carried on when i close steam menu.
thats usually fixed by grabbing an object with that hand, and then dropping the object.
i've noticed it being an issue, but only on my quest 2, it's never happened on my quest 1. i just restart the game and it goes away, the grabbing thing doesn't do it, unfortunately
haven't experienced that issue in *ages* wow.
when i used my vive that happended all the time, open the create thing menu (or create unplaced) and just drag out any shape and move it the controller that is vibrating

thread.latestCommentText: when i used my vive that happended all the time, open the create thing menu (or create unplaced) and just drag out anyshape and move it the controller that is vibrating
